name: Echoes of the first light
description: The first expansion of the game, introducing new realms, creatures, and objects.

cards.name: Nightbone_the_scullbound_shade
cards.flavorText: A vengeful wraith bound to its own skull, it drifts through shadow, hunting the bloodline that betrayed it.
cards.passive: Bound by Bone - Upon death it leaves unit in skull. Pay 2 mana and place Nightbone on skull.

attacks.name: Skullash
attacks.description: Whips its spectral chain through the veil, dealing damage and silencing the target's next ability.

attacks.name: Echo of Death
attacks.description: Replays the last attack used against it, but twisted with shadow—halves the original effect and adds fear.

cards.name: The_drowned_vale
cards.flavorText: Where the dead sleep beneath, the mist rises and the ancient magic stirs beneath the surface.
cards.auxiliaryText: ...They say the trees here whisper in dead tongues.
cards.passive: Sunken Graves - At the start of each turn, one random creature gains +1 HP but suffers -1 speed.

cards.name: Miscastlings
cards.flavorText: Pitiful souls, bound by the Archmage’s spellwork. They no longer recall their lives—only their duty.
cards.auxiliaryText: Give them a job, and they’ll do it. Eventually.
cards.passive: Residual Spark - If serving an Arcane Realm, roll a d6 at the start of your turn. On a 6, gain 1 extra mana.

cards.name: Sprig_of_Endless_Growth
cards.flavorText: This sprig was plucked from the First Tree, deep within the Verdant Veil, where time flows sideways and roots whisper ancient secrets of growth and rebirth.
cards.auxiliaryText: No fire, frost, or shadow has yet stilled its quiet growth.
cards.passive: Rootbound Blessing - Once per turn, when a Verdant creature is active, gain 1 extra mana or heal 1 point of your Realm’s health — your choice.

cards.name: Scorchback_Tusker
cards.flavorText: Born from molten soil, it charges with the fury of the flame. Its breath smells of ash and battle.
cards.passive: Volcanic Surge - Whenever this creature takes damage, roll a d4. On a 4, deal 1 damage to the attacking creature.

attacks.name: Blazing Bite
attacks.description: The target gets burning. If the target is already burning, deal +1 additional damage.

cards.name: Tears_of_the_Storm_Phoenix
cards.flavorText: Tears of a phoenix born in lightning, these golden drops fall from the sky when storms strike lonely peaks.
cards.auxiliaryText: The phoenix’s cry stirs the storm, and its tears answer.
cards.passive: Stormbound Link - When played, restore 3 mana to your active creature. If the Storm Phoenix is active, it also gains +2 attack on its next turn.

cards.name: Storm_Phoenix
cards.flavorText: High above the clouds, its scream echoes like thunder across the heavens. Wherever the Storm Phoenix soars, tempests rise—and its golden tears fall like omens.
cards.passive: Crybind - Flying. If Tears of the Storm Phoenix is active, this creature's main attack costs 1 less mana.

attacks.name: Cry of the Tempest
attacks.description: The phoenix lets out a thunderous cry, calling the storm. Target loses 1 mana on its next turn.

cards.name: The_Vera_Spire
cards.flavorText: An ancient tower that spirals beyond the clouds, its halls echo with whispers of forbidden incantations.
cards.auxiliaryText: Even in defeat, the arcane reclaims what is lost.
cards.passive: Mana Reflux - When one of your creatures is defeated, your Realm recovers mana equal to half (rounded up) of the damage dealt by the attack that destroyed it.

cards.name: The_Archivist
cards.flavorText: It does not remember its name, only the weight of secrets never meant to be known.
cards.passive: Mind Severance - When defeated, randomly select 1 card from your opponent’s hand and discard it.

attacks.name: Mnemonic Rift
attacks.description: If the enemy has Umbral affinity, discard 1 card from your hand and place it at the bottom of your deck.

attacks.name: Scribe of the Forbidden
attacks.description: Draw 1 card. If it's an Arcane affinity object, deal +2 additional damage on your next turn.

cards.name: Cradle_of_Thorns
cards.flavorText: Where beauty entangles with peril, and the forest remembers every wound. The roots whisper old grudges, and every bloom hides a thorn.
cards.auxiliaryText: The forest forgets none, and shelters those it remembers...
cards.passive: Verdant Resurgence - When your creature is defeated, roll a d6. On 4+, return it to the field with half of its original Health (rounded up).

cards.name: Bonebellies
cards.flavorText: No one knows what cursed stew birthed the Bonebellies, but wherever they waddle, chaos follows. They’re not evil—just curious, distracted, and impossible to control.
cards.auxiliaryText: They don’t bite… unless they’re hungry. Which is always.
cards.passive: Pack Frenzy - Your active creature gains +1 Attack for each Bestial affinity card on the field (yours or your opponent's)

cards.name: Feral_Totem
cards.flavorText: Forged in instinct, the totem echoes the voice of the pack—calling every claw and fang to rise in unison.
cards.auxiliaryText: It howls when no one else dares.
cards.passive: Totemic Guard - Your creature takes 1 less damage from attacks. If it has Bestial affinity, it also gains +1 Attack on the next turn.

cards.name: Fangroot_Wastes
cards.flavorText: No walls, no words — only claw and howl. Here, survival is worship, and beasts rule by tooth and terror. To live here is to fight. To die here is to feed the next.
cards.passive: Primal Instinct - If your creature survives 3 turns, roll a d6. On a perfect, it fully heals. If it has Bestial affinity, its next attack deals x2 damage.

cards.name: Chronolens_of_the_Infinite_Spiral
cards.flavorText: Forged in a forgotten aeon, the Chronolens peers through fractured timelines to glimpse futures that never were—then folds one into reality.
cards.auxiliaryText: Its visions can twist the path of destiny.
cards.passive: Mind Pierce - Discard a random card from your opponent’s hand. If it’s an object, draw 1 card. If your creature is arcane, its attack cost 1 less mana.

cards.name: Shroud_of_Unmaking
cards.flavorText: Stitched from memories erased, it clings to no name or scent. Those who vanish beneath it aren’t hunted—because none remember to hunt them.
cards.auxiliaryText: Those who wear it are not hidden — they are forgotten.
cards.passive: Forgotten Veil - When your creature is attacked, roll a d20. On a 14+, the attack misses. If your creature has Umbral affinity, the attack misses on a 10+.

cards.name: Mycoform_Grubs
cards.flavorText: Soft-bodied and silent, these fungal grubs chew through rot and root alike—fertilizing the forest in quiet, tireless, almost reverent devotion.
cards.auxiliaryText: Tiny devotees of decay, roots, and rebirth.
cards.passive: Fungal Resurgence - If your Realm has half health or less, roll two d8. Restore health equal to the highest roll.

cards.name: Lantern_of_Hollow_Light
cards.flavorText: Lit with no flame and casting no warmth, it shows paths not yet walked—and those long buried.
cards.auxiliaryText: Its glow attracts more than it reveals.
cards.passive: Echo of the Unseen - When played, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose 2 to keep; place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Bloodfang_Draught
cards.flavorText: In barren lands, this blood appears only to dying beasts—offering cruel hope in their final breath.
cards.auxiliaryText: A mirage to most. Salvation to one.
cards.passive: Fang's Gamble - You may roll a d8 up to 3 times. Restore health equal to your final roll. If the creature has Bestial Affinity, add +3 to the final result.

cards.name: Wardglass_Prism
cards.flavorText: All that remains of the sacred orb shattered during the Great End—its last light still fiercely protective.
cards.auxiliaryText: Still warm to the touch, after all these years.
cards.passive: Mirror Pulse - If your active creature is Arcane, it takes no extra damage from Umbral affinity. For the next 2 turns, all your attacks cost only 1 mana.

cards.name: Mis_Varmauth
cards.flavorText: Mis Varmauth smells what others hide. Its eye-portals see no light, only the fractures between truths.
cards.passive: Scent of Secrets - While active, each time your opponent draws a card from their deck, they must reveal it to you.

attacks.name: Fracture Glare
attacks.description: Opens an eye-portal to unleash spatial distortion. Blind the enemy for 1 turn on a d8 roll of 6+.

attacks.name: Realm Reversal
attacks.description: If your Realm has less than half its health, roll a d12. If even, steal 3 mana from the enemy Realm and add it to yours.

cards.name: Skullies
cards.flavorText: Bumbling out of crypt cracks, Skullies wander in packs—forgotten souls with cracked heads, childlike mischief, and an odd sense of purpose.
cards.auxiliaryText: Not smart. Not quiet. Not harmless.
cards.passive: Rattle Chorus - At the start of your turn, roll a d6. On a 4 or higher, gain 1 mana. If your active creature is Umbral, gain 2 instead.

cards.name: Bloodroot_Jishnik
cards.flavorText: Its tentacles taste the air for heartbeats, dragging prey into the dark before they know they’ve been found.
cards.passive: Tangle Trap - Upon death, its roots keep writhing. Pay 2 mana next turn to entangle an enemy, paralizing movement for one turn.

attacks.name: Pulse Reaper
attacks.description: Its tentacles seize the living, delivering them screaming into the fangs that never release

attacks.name: Rootfang Lash
attacks.description: Roll a d12: on 5+, the target bleeds, losing -2 HP each turn. If the target is Verdant, the bleeding is automatic.

cards.name: Thorncoil_Detonator
cards.flavorText: A living Verdant warhead, its spiked shell hides the volatile heart of the living mother nature.
cards.passive: Deathbloom Burst - If destroyed by an enemy, deal instant 13 damage to that enemy.

attacks.name: Verdant Implosion
attacks.description: Sacrifice this creature exploiting itself. Deal damage equal to its remaining HP x2 to the enemy.

attacks.name: Thorned Resurgence
attacks.description: This creature channels its Verdant energy to reinforce itself. Restore +1 HP to this creature (can exceed starting HP).
